summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning, amending Section 23.60.014, Regulations supplemental, Section 23.60.152, General Development, Section 23.60.360, Uses permitted outright in the CR Environment, Section 23.60.394, Height in the CR Environment, Section 23.60.936, "S", Section 23.60.956, Calculation of Lot Depth, and Section 23.60.958, Calculation of Percent of a Lot Occupied by a Specific Use, and adding a new Section 23.60.365, Administrative Conditional Uses in the CR Environment, of SMC Chapter 23.60, Shoreline District, to implement the City's Environmentally Critical Areas Policies.
